Thought of the Day
Most decisions are just picking between two really good options
October 18, 2025

— SKITZO, Travis Scott

Try and explain your feelings, sound like something you rehearsed
— RAPSTAR, Polo G
This sh*t sound hard
It wasn't made easy
You can't live twice
Thank God I'm breathin'

Deadlines push you forward in magnitude but they also reduce your dimensionality
— Emily
Most decisions are just picking between two really good options
Does there exist a person that's better than you at everything you do?
Hope you know I want you, so do you want me?
If I said I love you, would you love me?
I could never dub you, but could you dub me?
I'on wanna fall in love, I'on think it's for me
— Love Me, Lil Tecca
Maybe being too nice lessens how seriously people take you
Self-love, he don't love himself, tryna love me
— Coi Leray and Metro Boomin'
